title: MNF Doubleheader released, Dolphins moves, Justin Fields expectations,  and Prime Time hopes
itunes:title: MNF Doubleheader released, Dolphins moves, Justin Fields expectations,  and Prime Time hopes
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with hope for the Dolphins in the AFC East. Hosts Kay Adams, Peter Schrager, Kyle Brandt and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara discuss Miami's moves and how it helps against the Bills and Patriots.  The table feels there needs to be a big jump from Justin Fields for the Bears, but there really is no bigger QB question than what the Seahawks are doing.  We learn the Week 2 Monday Night Football Doubleheader before asking the crew which team should have the most prime time appearances and explaining why it's not the Chiefs.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
